name: edge.controlPoints
descr: Get an array of control point positions for a [`curve-style: bezier`](#style/bezier-edges) or [`curve-style: unbundled-bezier`](#style/unbundled-bezier-edges) edge.

formats.name: edge.controlPoints
formats.descr: Get the control points in [model co-ordinates](#notation/position).

formats.name: edge.renderedControlPoints
formats.descr: Get the control points in [rendered co-ordinates](#notation/position).
